code: import React from"react";import RedCard from"../images/RedCard.png";import BlueCard from"../images/BlueCard.png";import BlackCard from"../images/BlackCard.png";import NeutralCard from"../images/NeutralCard.png";export default function Card(props){var cssClass="";var card="";if(props.info.team==="Blue"){cssClass+=" blue";card+=BlueCard;}else if(props.info.team==="Red"){cssClass+=" red";card+=RedCard;}else if(props.info.team==="Assassin"){cssClass+=" black";card+=BlackCard;}else{cssClass+=" neutral";card+=NeutralCard;}cssClass+=props.info.clicked?" revealed":" hidden";return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card"+cssClass,onClick:props.onClick},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,props.info.value));}
